input_args.passage: 'Georges-Henri Bousquet - Wikipedia | Georges-Henri Bousquet (21 June 1900, Meudon – 23 January 1978, Latresne) was a 20th-century French jurist, economist and Islamologist. He was a professor of law at the Faculty of Law of the University of Algiers where he was a specialist in the sociology of North Africa (Berbers, Islam)., 20th-century French jurist, economist and Islamologist'
